channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried seeks to reverse decision on contesting extradition: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: By consenting to extradition, Bankman-Fried would be able to appear in a United States court.

item.title: SBF risks 115 years in jail, Binance’s FUD, and auditors quit crypto: Hodler’s Digest Dec. 11-17
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff

item.title: Algorithmic stabilization is the key to effective crypto-finance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ben Goertzel
item.description: Crypto needs to move on from the LUNA crash and start trusting algorithmic stablecoins again.

item.title: SEC was “asleep at the wheel” about FTX - US Rep. Sessions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The Texas Congressman urged lawmakers to examine the SEC's efforts to prevent fraud at the crypto exchange.

item.title: How to add unlockable content to your NFT collection
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Sasha Shilina
item.description: In this article, we describe what unlockable content is, how it works, and how to add it to your NFT collection correctly.

item.title: Central Banks to set standards on banks’ crypto exposure - BIS
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The new standard limits crypto reserves among banks to 2% by 2025, and goes into effect on January 1, 2025.

item.title: Bitcoin still lacks this on-chain signal for BTC bull market — David Puell
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin network activity is "underwhelming," the famous analyst says, as further data reaffirms a textbook BTC price bottom in progress.

item.title: Bitvavo to prefund locked DCG assets worth $296.7M amid liquidity crisis
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The Digital Currency Group and its affiliates (DCG) cited liquidity problems as it suspended repayments, temporarily halting users from withdrawing their funds.

item.title: Metaverse experience to sway real-world travel choices in 2023: Survey
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: A survey participated by 24,179 respondents across 32 countries reveal that nearly half, or 43% of the respondents, intend to use virtual reality to inspire their choices.

item.title: Democrats to reportedly return over $1M of SBF's funding to FTX victims
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: Three democratic committees, the DNC, the DSCC and the DCCC, pledged to return SBF’s political donations after the entrepreneur was charged with eight counts of financial crimes.

item.title: The outcome of SBF's prosecution could determine how the IRS treats your FTX losses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Justin Wilcox
item.description: Will your losses to FTX be classified as capital losses or as a “theft loss” that involved a Ponzi scheme? Either way, you’ll probably win.

item.title: Hal Finney’s wife resumes activity on Bitcoin pioneer’s Twitter account to avoid potential purge
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Under Elon Musk’s leadership, Twitter suspended a number of accounts including those controlled by high-profile journalists and social networking platform Mastodon.

item.title: Argentina’s province to issue US dollar-pegged stablecoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The bill also authorizes local artists to issue nonfungible tokens (NFT) to promote financial and cultural inclusion.

item.title: Crypto Stories: Dr. Adam Back shares his life of hacks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: A cartoon version of Dr. Adam Back recounts stories of hacking coded doors at university and the inception of Hash Cash in the latest of Cointelegraph Crypto Stories.

item.title: Kadena CEO Stuart Popejoy on blockchain design: Proof-of-work is a feature, not a flaw
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The former JPMorgan executive shared how he learned to love crypto and why the Kadena blockchain is not letting go its firm embrace of proof-of-work.

item.title: Corporate America has finally taken notice of Web3 — US trademark lawyer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Trademark applications filed this year covered various disparate sectors.

item.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum gave back their gains, but has anything actually changed?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Big Smokey
item.description: Bullish crypto momentum fizzled after Fed Chair Powell poured cold water on investors’ hopes that a positive CPI report would trigger a trend change, but higher time frames remain interesting.

item.title: US Financial Stability Oversight Council urges congressional action on crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to the FSOC, issues at FTX had “precipitated price decreases in Bitcoin and other crypto-assets” but “had a limited impact on the broader U.S. financial system.”

item.title: Industry execs confident in DeFi adoption despite security flaws: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The top 100 DeFi token had a mixed week with majority of them losing bullish momentum from the last week.

item.title: Total crypto market cap takes another hit, but traders remain neutral
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: The total crypto market cap is at risk of falling below $825 billion, but data shows traders actively adding to their longs and shorts.

item.title: Why is Ethereum (ETH) price down today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.description: Ethereum price is down today and a growing list of challenges could continue to weigh on ETH price for the foreseeable future.

item.title: Bitcoin targets $16.7K amid fear BNB may ‘drag whole crypto market down’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BNB “has nothing but air below it,” one analyst warns as BTC price action goes from bad to worse.

item.title: FTX liquidators’ legal team urges cooperation with Bahamian authorities amid favoritism allegations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to lawyers representing FTX’s provisional liquidators, allegations that Bahamian officials were giving residents preferential treatment were “wholly without merit.”

item.title: Raydium is attacked, loses $2M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The team said that authority over the automated market maker and farm programs has been paused “for now.”

item.title: Only for foreign trade: Bank of Russia stands against free crypto investment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The Russian government doesn’t want to enable Bitcoin for regular Russian people, but rather exclusively for foreign trade entities.

item.title: Web3 community shares tips for a successful GameFi project
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: From creating e-sports competitions with huge prize pools to making game tokens more relevant to holders, members of the community share their thoughts on GameFi.

item.title: No more proof-of-reserve checks? Auditors quietly drop crypto projects from portfolios
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The firms work with prominent crypto exchanges such as Binance, KuCoin, Crypto.com, Gate.io, OKX and FTX.

item.title: BNB insurance for Binance listing? CZ addresses delisted project’s claims
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: While the delisting didn’t concern many due to its inactivity, others questioned the focus on price for delisting as it may prompt projects to artificially pump the price.

item.title: Bitcoin dips under $17K as ‘craziest rumors’ over Binance sink BTC price
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.category: why is bitcoin price down today
item.description: Bitcoin traders stay wary over Binance “FUD” triggering overly bearish BTC price action.

item.title: Binance proof-of-reserves removed from the auditor's site
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Mazars Group, known for its proof-of-reserve audit services for crypto companies, reportedly removed the audits from its site.
